name: SpaceBattler
description:
Team Name:
Parsek

Gameplay Instructions
2 players required
Game starts after all players connected
Gameplay Instructions Keyboard/Mouse:

B - Change buy/sell mods 
M - Hide Messages

H - Hide Hud

Left Mouse Button Clicks In Shop:

 Turrets - Buy Turrets

Ammo box(First from left)- buy ammo

Refresh box(Center) - refresh turrets

Barrel - Increase Max Energy
